content.c_answer2: Les Misérables is set over the course of 17 years of French history. It opens in Toulon in 1815, with Jean Valjean a prisoner under the watchful eye of Inspector Javert. The show then cuts to Montreil\-sur\-Mer in 1823. The final part takes place in Paris in 1832, with some of the latter moments occurring in an undetermined future.
content.name: When is Les Misérables set?
content.question: When is Les Misérables set?
